cbinstall.name: CB CMC
cbinstall.author: Compojoom - Yves Hoppe
cbinstall.description: A Community Builder plugin for CMC.

fieldset.label: Field Output
fieldset.description: You can restrict the query to only execute for the user and/or viewer as well as add custom text and substitute user fields in the output.

param.name: fieldMode
param.label: Output Mode
param.description: Whether to display the output and/or save it in another CB field.

param.name: fieldSaveName
param.label: Field Name
param.description: Enter the name of the CB field to save the output in.

param.name: fieldPrefix
param.label: Add Prefix
param.description: Enter a prefix to add before the output.

param.name: fieldDelimiter
param.label: Add Delimiter
param.description: Enter a delimiter to seperate the values.

param.name: fieldSuffix
param.label: Add Suffix
param.description: Enter a suffix to add after the output.

param.name: fieldDisplay
param.label: Profile Display
param.description: Whether to restrict the field to the user or visitors.

param.name: fieldSubstitute
param.label: Use Substitutions
param.description: Whether to substitute [cb_fieldname] in the output with data from the user or visitor.
